update t_server_info
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pc_name = #{pcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
os_type = #{osType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where bar_id = #{barId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_valid= 1
